com.here.platform.location.dataloader.core.caching

Class LRUCachingTileLoader<T>

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.here.platform.location.dataloader.core.AbstractTileLoaderDecorator<T,T>
      • com.here.platform.location.dataloader.core.caching.LRUCachingTileLoader<T>
  • Type Parameters:
    T - The type of data loaded.
    All Implemented Interfaces:
    CachingDataLoader<TileId,T>, CachingTileLoader<T>, com.here.platform.location.dataloader.core.caching.internal.LRUCachingDataLoaderImpl<TileId,T>, DataLoader<TileId,T>, TileLoader<T>
    Deprecated. 
    Use methods based on OptimizedMapLayers instead. Since SDK 2.54.

    public class LRUCachingTileLoader<T>
extends com.here.platform.location.dataloader.core.AbstractTileLoaderDecorator<T,T>
implements com.here.platform.location.dataloader.core.caching.internal.LRUCachingDataLoaderImpl<TileId,T>, CachingTileLoader<T>
    Decorates a TileLoader with an LRU cache of the given maximum size (in number of elements).

    param: inner the wrapped tile loader. param: size the internal cache's size limit.
